title: 2: S4E02 – "Ghoulish Games" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three terrifying tales from author TheHootax and two additional anonymous authors, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about four-dimensional fears, ghoulish games, and not-so-virtual reality. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s4e02
